data.name: Minigunner
data.detailed_description:
In Minigunner you are tasked with defending a remote mining outpost from waves of squishy slime-like enemies that attack from the mines. Buy sentries, items and drones to bolster your defense and become increasingly more powerful. With the ability to dodge attacks, you can outplay enemies even in the face of overwhelming odds. Use strategy and planning in shops to purchase items that unlock creative synergies, and put your sense of risk vs reward to the test as you attempt to gain an edge over the hordes coming your way.

Key Features:

  • Thrilling moment-to-moment twin-stick shooter combat
  • A TON of unique and interesting items that come together to form powerful builds
  • Intense boss fights, with special arenas that are different every time
  • 8 unlockable mercenaries with different weapons, abilities, passives, and special class-specific items
  • A handcrafted environment that is constantly changing, use its layout to your advantage with 2-way teleporters, a controllable drawbridge, vents ඞ, and more
  • Frequent access to shop terminals, where you can choose what to buy, giving you more agency over your runs
  • Limitless replayability, with randomized items, enemies, waves, boss fight rooms, and attack layouts, no two runs will ever be the same

data.short_description: Fight to survive in this intense twin-stick shooter! Collect sentries, items, and drones as you unleash mayhem to defend a mining outpost from waves of goopy monsters that emerge from below.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
